page.title: 01GENERAL West Forres
page.content: This area to the west of the burgh of Forres is mainly a fertile river valley.Where the land permits there is farming and there are seven farms :Mundole,Mannachie, Knockomie,Blairs, Balnaferry,Whiterow,Balnageith mostly growing barley or raising beef or dairy cattle.The remaining land is used for forestry carried out on the Darnaway and Altyre Eststes. There is no urban development .At Red Craig and Mannachie small private housing estates have been developed and there is a caravan and chalet park at Mundole.There are several recreational pursuits available - fishing,orienteering,walking,horse riding,rifle range etc.
